column1: Local Foods////Tried this place with a co-worker for lunch!! When you walk in the atmosphere is welcoming. It's a cute little spot for lunch breaks. They have plenty of seating and the customer service is exceptional. The menus are at the door for viewing
column2: you choose what you want and approach the register to order. I ordered the "Turkey Confit" but on pretzel bun and it was sooooooo good!! I will be coming back!!
